artist: Artist: Andrew Goldfarb; Publisher: Andrew Goldfarb
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of three figures in a car with letterpress text and designs printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 28 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Ogner Stump's One Thousand Sorrows
